mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_HOS_RECORDS JOIN TB_PET USING (PET_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM IND, HOS_NO, TO_CHAR(HOS_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "HOS_DATE", PET_NAME petName FROM TB_HOS_RECORDS JOIN TB_PET USING (PET_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY HOS_NO DESC) ORDER BY IND DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM IND, HOS_NO, TO_CHAR(HOS_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "HOS_DATE", PET_NAME FROM TB_HOS_RECORDS JOIN TB_PET USING (PET_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY HOS_NO DESC) ORDER BY IND DESC) WHERE HOS_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE (#{startDate}) AND TO_DATE (#{endDate})+1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM IND, WALK_NO, TO_CHAR(WALK_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "WALK_DATE", WALK_TITLE, FILE_PATH filePath ||'/'||UPLOAD_NAME UploadName "PATH" FROM TB_WALK_RECORDS JOIN TB_PET USING (PET_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MYPAGE_FILE ON (TB_WALK_RECORDS.FILE_MYPAGE_NO = TB_MYPAGE_FILE.FILE_MYPAGE_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}) WHERE WALK_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE (#{startDate}) AND TO_DATE (#{endDate})+1
SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NO) FROM TB_ROLE JOIN TB_USER USING(ROLE_ID) JOIN TB_BOARD USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO= #{userNo}
SELECT TO_CHAR(MAX(BOARD_CREATE_DATE), 'YYYY-MM-DD')"LASTDATE" FROM TB_BOARD WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT ROWNUM IND, PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_SPECIES, FILE_MYPAGE_NO FROM TB_PET WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY PET_NO
SELECT PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_SPECIES, PET_SPECIFIC, PET_WEIGHT, PET_GENDER, PET_PERSONALITY, PET_ETC FROM TB_PET WHERE PET_NO=#{petNo}
SELECT FILE_MYPAGE_NO, ORIGINAL_NAME, UPLOAD_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM TB_MYPAGE_FILE JOIN TB_PET USING(FILE_MYPAGE_NO) WHERE PET_NO=#{petNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MYPAGE_FILE ( FILE_MYPAGE_NO, ORIGINAL_NAME, UPLOAD_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_MYPAGE_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{originalName}, #{uploadName}, #{filePath} )

INSERT INTO TB_PET ( PET_NO, PET_NAME, PET_SPECIES, PET_SPECIFIC, PET_WEIGHT, PET_GENDER, PET_PERSONALITY, PET_ETC, USER_NO, FILE_MYPAGE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PET_NO.NEXTVAL, #{petName}, #{petSpecies}, #{petSpecific}, #{petWeight}, #{petGender}, #{petPersonality}, #{petEtc}, #{userNo} SEQ_MYPAGE_FILE_NO.CURRVAL )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_PET SET PET_NAME=#{petName}, PET_SPECIES=#{petSpecies}, PET_SPECIFIC=#{petSpecific}, PET_WEIGHT=#{petWeight}, PET_GENDER=#{petGender}, PET_PERSONALITY=#{petPersonality}, PET_ETC=#{petEtc} WHERE PET_NO=#{petNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_SUGGESTION ( SUG_NO, SUG_TITLE, SUG_CONTENT, SUG_DATE, USER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_SUG_NO.NEXTVAL, #{sugNo}, #{sugTitle}, SYSDATE, #{userNo} )
INSERT INTO TB_MYPAGE_FILE ( FILE_MYPAGE_NO, SUG_NO, ORIGINAL_NAME, UPLOAD_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_MYPAGE_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_SUG_NO.CURRVAL, #{originalName}, #{uploadName}, #{filePath} )
INSERT INTO TB_MYPAGE_FILE ( FILE_MYPAGE_NO, ORIGINAL_NAME, UPLOAD_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_MYPAGE_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{originalName}, #{uploadName}, #{filePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT HOS_NO, TO_CHAR(HOS_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "HOS_DATE", HOS_VACCINATION, HOS_ILLNESS, HOS_MEDICINE, HOS_CONTENT, PET_NO FROM TB_HOS_RECORDS WHERE HOS_NO=#{hosNo}

SELECT HOS_NO, TO_CHAR(HOS_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "HOS_DATE", HOS_VACCINATION, HOS_ILLNESS, HOS_MEDICINE, HOS_CONTENT, PET_NO, PET_NAME FROM TB_HOS_RECORDS JOIN TB_PET USING(PET_NO) JOIN TB_USER USING(USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND HOS_NO = (SELECT MAX(HOS_NO) FROM TB_HOS_RECORDS)
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_HOS_RECORDS SET PET_NO = #{petNo}, HOS_DATE = #{hosDate}, HOS_VACCINATION = #{hosVaccination}, HOS_ILLNESS = #{hosIllness}, HOS_MEDICINE = #{hosMedicine}, HOS_CONTENT = #{hosContent} WHERE HOS_NO = #{hosNo}
